content: published in *new table designs* star book no 49 by american thread company in 1946 this pattern does not provide gauge information it requires 80 250-yd balls of thread or approximately 20 000 yds each square measures about 6-1/2 inches yarn called for is american thread company star six cord mercerized crochet cotton article 77 and a #10 or #11 steel crochet hook is suggested based on hook size this was probably either a size 20 or size 30 crochet thread
